about_the_game:
ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー

This work is a game created at Byking Co., Ltd.'s training for new employees.
It may not work properly depending on your PC environment.
Also, unintended problems may occur in the game.
please note that.

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー

■What is "Killpaku!"?
A 3D action game where you control Bebe, a gluttonous monster.
Aim at the weak points of the fighting "onis" and deal the final blow!
Literally, enjoy picking the best parts!



■Three types of “copying”, “predation”, “stealing”, and “imitation”

Make full use of the 3 actions to earn more scores within the 3 minute time limit!
Eat as much as you can to avoid being defeated and aim for S rank!

■The first “rip-off” and “predation”
It can extend its tongue to eat weakened prey.
There are two ways to eat, one is to eat quickly in a straight line, and the other is to eat in batches while rotating.



■Second “rip-off” and “stealing”
It is the act of finding a weakened enemy and taking the final blow from the prey.
If the timing is right, you can "predate".
Move around so as not to be defeated, and aim for the enemies whose health bar is yellow and prey on them!



■Third “copying” and “imitation”
You can change the color by passing through puddles scattered throughout the game.
Let's blend in with the herd of oni and prey safely!



■Worldview
``Bebe'' is a gluttonous monster, but he doesn't have the strength to fight his prey on his own.
Therefore, they ``mimic'' their prey, mix with the herd, and ``predate'' the moment the prey is weakened.




The prey of this game is "Oni".
"Oni" has strong power that can defeat other creatures with a single blow, and has lived by eating a lot of food.
As a result, Bebe has a plump body and is well-nourished.
They have low intelligence and are easily angered, and ``Red Oni'' and ``Blue Oni'' often fight each other just because of their color difference.

name: KiLLPaKu!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel i7 6770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 980
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
